name: octopath-cotc-meta-guide
description: OCTOPATH COTC META GUIDE - Vue 3 Migration

scripts.build: vite build && mkdir -p dist-vue/data && cp data/characters_enhanced_v3.json data/accessories.json dist-vue/data/
scripts.deploy:vue: npm run build:github && echo 'Vue build ready for GitHub Pages in dist-vue/'
